by.htp.dao

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBUserDAO

    public interface UserDAO
    Users Data Access Object interface. Provides CRUD operations with User objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    D.Maniuk on 20.10.2019

    • Method Summary

      Finds the primary key of the user table in the database by its name

      Finds the primary key (id) of the user in the database by the patient’s id assigned to it
      java.util.ArrayList<Doctor> findListOfLeaveUser()
      Finds in the database all dismissed users (users with the string 'out' is false)

      Finds information about all active users in the database

      Finds information about a doctor’s specialization in the database

      • autorization

        User autorization(java.lang.String login,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws DAOException
        Constructs an authorizations User object from a human-readable login and password.
        Parameters:
        login - the nickname of the user
        password - this is password
        Returns:
        the User objects
        Throws:
        DAOException - - exception thrown in DAO or connection pool

      • registration

        User registration(User newUser)
           throws DAOException
        Creates database entries from the User object
        Parameters:
        newUser - - new user object with collected data - name, position, position, username and password
        Returns:
        the newUser object
        Throws:
        DAOException - - exception thrown in DAO or connection pool

          throws DAOException
        Modifies the rows of the table user database corresponding to the User object
        Parameters:
        user - - user object for which changes will be made (id cannot be changed)
        Returns:
        the new User object

        DAOException - - exception thrown in DAO or connection pool

  throws DAOException
        Finds the primary key of the user table in the database by its name
        Parameters:
        name - - whose username is to be found
        Returns:
        id user (primary key) if if the database contains a user with that name
        Throws:
        DAOException - - exception thrown in DAO or connection pool

      • findIdUserForPatient

        int findIdUserForPatient(int idPatient)
                  throws DAOException
        Finds the primary key (id) of the user in the database by the patient’s id assigned to it
        Parameters:
        idPatient - is primary key of the patient
        Returns:
        id user if if the database contains a patient with line idPatient
        Throws:
        DAOException - - exception thrown in DAO or connection pool

      • updateUserOutOf

        void updateUserOutOf(int userId)
              throws DAOException
        Modifies the user line 'out', after which the user is not used in the system (considered dismissed)
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        DAOException - - exception thrown in DAO or connection pool
